channel.title: Fighting for the Faith
channel.description: This is a program that defends the Christian Faith from attacks from both inside and outside of the visible Church. Think of this program as theology on roller blades. We name names as well as expose errors and heresies. We also try to have a little fun along the way. Topics include, apologetics, doctrine, and the Good News that Jesus Christ is God in Human Flesh and that He Died for the Sins of the World.
channel.generator: Feeder 3 3.1.4(2615); Mac OS X Version 10.11.2 (Build 15C50) http://reinventedsoftware.com/feeder/
channel.itunes:author: Chris Rosebrough @PirateChristian
channel.itunes:subtitle: A Pirate Christian Radio Production

channel.itunes:keywords: Christianity, Theology, Apologetics, Doctrine, Seeker Sensitive, Emergent Church, Emerging Church
